issues.description: The problem statement specifies that the GET /persons endpoint returns a Set of Person objects, but the template (and solution) code declares getAllPersons() to return a List<Person>. This type mismatch between the documented API signature and the provided method signature can confuse students about the expected return type.
issues.suggested_fix: Either update the problem statement to say that GET /persons returns a List<Person>, or change the return type of getAllPersons() (and PersonService.getAll()) in the template and solution to Set<Person> to match the documentation.
